pageProduct.name: Thursday Plantation Tea Tree Concealer Blemish Stick Medium 7ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Thursday Plantation Tea Tree Concealer flawlessly controls acne and conceals skin imperfections such as blemishes, pimples and skin redness. Antibacterial Tea Tree Oil dries out pimples and breakouts, whilst Manuka Honey helps to reduce the appearance of acne scars.

Thursday Plantation Tea Tree Concealer flawlessly controls acne and conceals skin imperfections such as blemishes, pimples and skin redness. Formulated with good for you natural ingredients, including Tea Tree oil and Manuka Honey to benefit the skin, it delivers lasting coverage with each application. The extremely smooth texture and the sponge-tipped applicator allows for precise and gentle application. For perfect cover, choose from Light or Medium shade to complement your natural skin tone.
A Unique triple action, based on three ingredients drawn from nature:
1. Natural Mineral concealers act to conceal
2. 100% pure Australian Tea Tree oil, with an anti-bacterial action that dries out pimples and blackheads
3. Reduces the appearance of acne scars, with natural Manuka Honey

Australian made. Product not tested on animals.

Suitable For: Acne prone skin

Sweat Resistant?: Yes

Boxed Contents: bottle

Size: 7mL

Non-Comedogenic?: Yes

Soap-Free?: Yes

Skin Type: Combination| Dry| Normal| Oily

Skin Condition: Breakouts

Shelf Life in Days: 1095

Alcohol Free?: Yes

KEY FEATURES

• Prevents acne by drying out pimples and blackheads
• Conceals blemishes, spots and imperfections
• Reduces the appearance of acne scars
• Hygienic 'no touch' wand format
• Made with 100% Australian grown tea tree oil and New Zealand Manuka honey
• Not tested on animals

Warnings

For external use only. Skin patch test prior to use. If sensitivity occurs discontinue use. Avoid contact with eyes.
Do not apply to broken skin. Keep out of reach of children.

Ingredients

Water, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Titanium Dioxide/CI 77891, Undecane, Capryloyl Glycerin/Sebacic Acid Copolymer, Glycerin, Melaleuca Alternifolia (Tea Tree) Leaf Oil, Zinc Oxide, Tridecane, Stearalkonium Hectorite, Magnesium Sulfate, Polyglyceryl-3 Diisostearate, Phenoxyethanol, Polyglyceryl-3 Polyricinoleate, Iron Oxides/CI 77492/CI 77491, Citric Acid, Iron Oxides/CI 77499, Honey Extract, Ethylhexylglycerin, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice Powder. Contains Limonene.

Directions

Apply to the appropriate areas as frequently as required.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store below 30C

Storage Temperature: 30C

RECYCLABLE INFORMATION

Recyle carton

Recyclable Packaging?: Yes
